system.sustained: Create a three metre high, one metre thick wall of fire that can be up to 10m x Willpower Bonus metres long. The wall can be placed anywhere within range, and even on top of foes who get a +20 Agility Test to move out of the way. Those that cross or fail the agility test to avoid the wall take 1d10+5 Energy Damage with Flame Quality that ignores Armour.
